Reviews.Title: “Warm Hospitality in the Cold Winter”

Reviews.Content: sister stayed hotel manoir february 2011 south carolina didnt expect visit canada found sweet bed breakfast loads character conveniently located walkable near easy metro stop welcome host hotel manoir staff extremely helpful friendly recommending restaurants providing directions mentioned previous posts hotel process undergoing renovations soon breakfast currently cozy ground floor moved prime location floor front desk oh word breakfast cinnamon raisin bread delicious toasted aside choices hardboiled eggs cereal yogurt fruit bagels orange juice coffee etc guest getting upgrades ours freshly painted overall warm cozy bed breakfast perfect escape piles snow outside
